t: Queer-Owned: The Ultimate Guide to Personal Branding for LGBTQ+ Entrepreneurs: Amazon.co.uk: Paul, Hank: 9798533583053: Books
Amazon Restricts L.G.B.T.Q. Products in United Arab Emirates - The New York Times
s: June 29, 2022 - Several specific book titles were blocked, including “My Lesbian Experience With Loneliness,” by Nagata Kabi; “Gender Queer: A Memoir,” by Maia Kobabe; and Roxane Gay’s “Bad Feminist.” All are available in print and digital formats on Amazon’s website in the United States.
